title: USE THESE 3 TIPS TO USE THE BACK WALL LIKE A PRO #padel
prerequisites: Some experience playing shots from the back of the court

sections.title: Introduction
sections.description: Brief introduction to using the back wall effectively in padel.

sections.title: Tip 1: Body Positioning
sections.description: Explanation of proper body orientation - facing the sidewall completely when playing back wall shots.

sections.title: Tip 2: Point of Impact
sections.description: Demonstration of the correct contact point, hitting the ball slightly in front of the body.

sections.title: Tip 3: Short Preparation
sections.description: Guidance on racket preparation, emphasizing that a short backswing is sufficient for effective back wall shots.

notes: Concise and informative short video focusing on a specific technical aspect of padel - using the back wall. The three tips are clearly explained and demonstrated. Good visual examples make the concepts easy to understand for intermediate players. While brief, the content is precise and actionable.
